lenders.name: Lynette
lenders.loan_because: Kiva lets me help others, the way people have helped my family in the past.

lenders.name: Mike and Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want peace
lenders.occupational_info: I love all people

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: We have to start somewhere...
lenders.occupational_info: I am an accounting manager.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Jayne
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for my four healthy children and all the opportunities that we have been blessed with.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children who live in the city about living on a farm and caring for the farm animals. We have horses, sheep, goats, chickens, rabbits and a pig. Most of these children have had no contact with animals except for dogs and cats.  I also enjoy sewing, knitting, and crafts. I admire anyone who has the drive to make their life better for their family.

lenders.name: Skylar
lenders.loan_because: My Mommy and Daddy want me to learn about the world and help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to play!

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because:
This is a great way to help people improve their living conditions.  I can't afford to offer much, but the bit of money I can lend is doing some real good all over the world.  

I started out with just a few loans because that's all I could afford.  But after each loan is repaid, I lend the money to more people through Kiva.  By doing this, I've been able to help 65 people so far!  It's a wonderful feeling to know that I've done some good in the world.

With everyone offering what they can, it adds up to make a true difference to people in need.  What a wonderful thing Kiva is!

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: My world, no matter how big or small, will be better because I am here.
lenders.occupational_info: Attorney & CPO, Privacy Dir at Liberty Coalition, GW Law and U of Utah grad, Husband & Father of 6 kids. Mormon Helping Hands NJ Coordinator.

lenders.name: Glen
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to partner with others such that they can work to improve their livlihood.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Materals Manager. I buy materials from suppliers such that factories can produce their products.

lenders.name: Roger & Janet
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to make a little money have a large impact.

lenders.name: Kenzie
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of any better ways to help people.

lenders.name: Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I believe it is a worthwhile efort to invest in the hopes and dreams of people who have something to contribute.

lenders.name: ahmed
lenders.loan_because: MY RELEGEN ISLAM  ASK FOR  HELPE OTHER BROTHERS   FOR US  THOSE  NEED HELP
lenders.occupational_info: AM  TRAINNING SUP.  AND  SUPERVICE  ON  SMALL BUSNESS IN MY CITY

lenders.name: Janene
lenders.loan_because: So many people in this world need a helping hand. And microcredit is a very easy way of  offering assistance to those that need it.

lenders.name: Karen, Eli & Jorn
lenders.loan_because: Together we will change the world!

lenders.name: Arthur
lenders.loan_because: I learned about Kiva from NPR's Marketplace program, and the concept fascinated me.
lenders.occupational_info: I support people who write computer software.

lenders.name: Kallie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I build cargo planes that are in use worldwide.

lenders.name: Karyn, Allan & Sam
lenders.loan_because: In celebration of our 16th wedding anniversary, Karyn & Allan want to do our small part to eliminate poverty, with a focus on helping women and their families.  Sam is not a fan of the microlending idea yet, but hopefully this can be a teaching opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Allan is a history professor and author of "The Keys to the White House."  Karyn is a writer and activist.  Sam is a scholar and an athlete.  He plays football and lacrosse.

lenders.name: Jean-Luc
lenders.loan_because:
The strong should support the one in need! 
Supporting Kiva is one step in the right direction.
lenders.occupational_info:
Weekly: Business Advisor & Program Manager
Weekend: Networker

lenders.name: Ryan & Susan
lenders.loan_because: We have made great success with loans we were granted during our education and careers.
lenders.occupational_info: Rewarding!

lenders.name: Vasu
lenders.loan_because: Manavasevae Madhavaseva (Service to Humanity is Service to GOD)

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: Leveraging the potential of individual.
lenders.occupational_info: Monitoring goals and tracking the costs to accomplish them.

lenders.name: Deanna & Ram
lenders.loan_because: It's a small way to make a big difference.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: It seems to be one of the best ways to help improve the quality of peoples lives.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I care and I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Lin Family
lenders.loan_because: Blessing from God

lenders.name: The Williams Family
lenders.loan_because: We have been very fortunate and think that this is without a doubt a great way to share our good fortune and involve our whole family.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an entrepreneur who has been through several start up companies and always had investors who had faith in our visions. 

My current organization is an internet development company that specializes in working with non-profit  organizations on e-communications initiatives.

lenders.name: scott
lenders.loan_because: It is a small thing that I can do to help others in need. This world can be a better place for everyone,if everyone would lend a hand to some one else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Architect in San Diego, California

lenders.name: Daniel Durrant
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of creativity and innovation.  When humanity is resourceful and generous with each other anything can be accomplished.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people helping people.
lenders.occupational_info: Process environmental data and display them on maps to help scientists understand the spatial distribution of pollutant concentrations.

lenders.name: Cindy L
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and I feel blessed because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I have my own consulting and teaching business.

lenders.name: Grandma
lenders.loan_because: The profiles/pictures make the people real and you get a sense that your small loan goes a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on the fiscal side of a non-profit coalition that services rape crisis centers.

lenders.name: NeoAgeBoy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the cause.
lenders.occupational_info:
Trained as an electrical engineer, Neal enjoys his current work developing software for a large defense contractor.  Frequently, he would exercise his managerial power to allocate resources in order to complete projects on time.  One of Neal's favorite quote is, 

"The difference between rats and people is that rats learn from experience."
-B. F. Skinner

As a result, sometimes he can be seen observing the rodents at work to gain insight to their quality.

lenders.name: Heather Hayes
lenders.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do. I'm making this loan in my mom Barbara's honor. Happy Mothers' Day!

I'll never forget people who have helped me get a "leg up" in life: Pat of "Pat's Shoe Repair" in Kilmainham, Dublin: Credit on a shoe repair goes a long way; a mysterious man with a white suit and a white Mercedes, in 1985 La Mancha, who filled our empty gas tank when we were broke and ran out of gas in a beat-up Renault 4--- and hundreds of others. Thanks to you.
lenders.occupational_info: Day-job: interpreter in federal courts. Also musician, screenwriter, etc.,

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: This is the most direct way to raise the standard of living for others in the world, it takes so little to dramatically influence people's lives! If enough capital is put into each of these places everyone's life becomes better.
lenders.occupational_info: We print & package direct mail advertising (aka junk mail)

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the best hope for the world is to invest in the minds and lives of people in parts of the world that need innovation and hope to solve their problems. And in doing so, they might even find a solution for a problem in our part of the world.

lenders.name: Maureen & Jean-Luc
lenders.loan_because: We want to help women in developing countries
lenders.occupational_info: Maureen is an artist (painting, jewelry) who works from home and Jean-Luc works for a large computer company

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: ...loaning assists people to achieve their goals and hopes in a manner that builds confidence, integrity, and a value of independence.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: A little goes a long,long way for these folk.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: Since the concept of micro-loans first started being discussed widely I've thought what a fantastic idea they were, especially for women in developing countries who might not always have access to financial help for whatever reason. Now I can participate in lending which is great!  I know the money goes straight to the person I have chosen without any strings attached other than fair interest.  I am able to see how it's being used and know that it has helped a person realise their dream when it comes back to me - and then I can loan it out again - I like that bit the best :)
lenders.occupational_info: I'm finishing up my PhD in Archaeology, working on the prehistoric diet of Aitutaki in the Cook Islands.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I am making a difference with my Grandchildren.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the safetly of the people in my care that they will not get hurt from the medications that they take.  I am a chemist, drugist or pharmacist depending which country you are in.

lenders.name: David N
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people become successful and improve their lives.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people directly to help themselves.  I stay away from handouts, but this is a venture I can really get behind.  It builds trust, pride, and individual power in a way that donations can't.

lenders.name: Le groupe dextor limitée
lenders.loan_because: The dextor group is determined to grow its shareholder equity while ensuring a dynamic management of long-term investments and ensuring its social responsibility towards the communities.
lenders.occupational_info:
The dextor group is a management and holding company with interest in private and public companies.

It is also actively involved in the community by actively participating in non profit organizations.

lenders.name: Katie & Drew
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of money can make a big differnce here.

lenders.name: Deana and Yoo-Shin
lenders.loan_because: In honour of our wedding guests.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer programmer and Lawyer.

lenders.name: Nadir
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy and affordable way to assist, one step at a time, in the comfort of your home, thousands of miles away.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Canadian Bank and manage the Bank's investments.

lenders.name: Jay, Gloria and family
lenders.loan_because: We want other people to have the same opportunities that we have had and to remember that Americans can be a generous people.
lenders.occupational_info: Almost-retired small business owner (Jay) and retired elementary school teacher (Gloria)

lenders.name: Abigail
lenders.loan_because: I feel inspired to share my wealth with others in a sustainable way.

lenders.name: Lyle
lenders.loan_because: I have enough stuff in my life.  It's nice to be able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I inspect boilers and pressure vessels to make sure they are safe.  I go to alot of chemical and petro-chemical plants.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: Big changes can be made with small steps
lenders.occupational_info: I treat dogs and cats for their illnesses so that they can live longer, healthier lives.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in this lifetime. I am agressive in every endeavor that I pursue and I like watching other's realize their dreams. Secretly, I aspire to be a budding entrepreneur one day...myself...but until then, I will watch Kiva recipients do just that...
lenders.occupational_info: I inspect facilities to insure the public's safety.

lenders.name: Jeff and Family
lenders.loan_because: I want to impact the lives of people around the world  by sharing my prosperity through microloans.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell electronic components to design engineers.

lenders.name: Fisk
lenders.loan_because: it's fun.
lenders.occupational_info: I design systems to heat and cool buildings.

lenders.name: Janez
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy it...

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to give a hand up.

lenders.name: Benito
lenders.loan_because: I see this as one means of fulfilling the Great Commission; I have been blessed to be a blessing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university professor and a retired US Army Officer.  I am a social work educator and value independence and self-sufficiency.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I'm making a difference without removing accountability.  It feels good!

lenders.name: Harris Family
lenders.loan_because: I believe that work, done well, gives people great power in their lives.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: The world needs people with dreams, and my dream is to help others realize thier dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for years to make a living, and finally achieved a goal that others may look at as adding more work, but to me it's a dream come true, - I'm a Micro-farmer (Not much land but a lot of satisfaction) some people would just call me a gardener..

lenders.name: Team Devereaux
lenders.loan_because: it feels right. We have so much, others have so little. Helping them help themselves is the least we can do to make their lives a little better.
lenders.occupational_info: We work in retail and finance. And I blog :) http://www.bigfamilylittleincome.com/

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.occupational_info: I write materials that are used to teach MBA students.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because:
“Give to the one who asks you, and do not turn away from the one who wants to borrow from you.”
-Matthew 5:42

“If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him?”
-1 John 3:17

lenders.name: Leni
lenders.loan_because: We are glad we can help out a little bit, but YOU - the borrowers -- are  the ones who do the real work. May your efforts bring forth good fruits!
lenders.occupational_info: My hobby is cooking and developing recipes that are healthy and easy to make - especially recipes with foods that help to prevent cancer. So I write a blog, http://monamifood.wordpress.com/about/ with simple ideas for preparing dishes that include anti-cancer foods.

lenders.name: Worker
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of people helping each other direct.
lenders.occupational_info: I am business owner just like you.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy helping others.

lenders.name: Peter & Julie
lenders.loan_because: It's fun to see people in less fortunate countries succeed in life.
lenders.occupational_info:
Peter manages the environmental and safety responsibilities of a small company in the United States.  

Julie works for the local county government.

lenders.name: Mike Palmer
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of micro lending and I'm thankful for Kiva to give me the opportunity to help others provide for themselves, their families and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a local company that brews craft beer. In my spare time I am starting a company that makes beer cheese. Hopefully the karma I've been putting in here will return to my own endeavor.

lenders.name: Jakub
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: read, read and read a lot

lenders.name: Bret
lenders.loan_because: it allows me to fight for justice and alleviate hunger.
lenders.occupational_info: I design, build and opperate hotel and restaurant developments. My vision is "To be the primary source of hospitality in the communities we serve by providing our guests the best possible experience and by being good neighbors."

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to be an entrepreneur; it can be exciting and challenging, and also difficult at times.  I want to help hard-working people make their lives better for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have pain or injuries.  By massaging and stretching their muscles, I help increase their circulation and facilitate healing.  I also have my own business as a wellness home consultant with a wellness company called Nikken. When I am not working, I enjoy time with my husband raising my 4 children, ages 8, 6, 4, and 2months.

lenders.name: "G"
lenders.loan_because: I can and ... it is fun to have my own  private "Marshall Plan" for Africa.  Hmmmm...or should I say: "G's Plan"  ? ;-)

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: I am live on this earth

lenders.name: Sheryl
lenders.loan_because: My heart and my spirit moves me to help someone fulfill their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a law firm and assist the attorney by preparing the necessary paperwork to be filed in court  and I correspond with the businesses that we provide services to.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I have never had the ability or funding to start my own business, but feel that being able to help an entrepreneur realize his or her dream can make a real difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that manufactures healthcare equipment like X-ray machines, CT Scanners, etc...  My responsibility is leading the team that keeps the computer systems running that make sure our equipment in hospitals gets serviced.

lenders.name: Sunil
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate and thankful for the opportunities that my parents have provided for me and I only hope to provide someone less fortunate with a hand up.  Donations are one thing but empowering someone to provide for themselves and their family is the best feeling in the world.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to support the efforts of those trying to better their lives by honest and hard work.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a team to facilitate educational exchange as well as cultural dialog through media

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: for American's, it is such a simple way to help real people.  I hope my contribution makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small design firm with an office in my home.  We specialize in preserving and adaptively reusing historic buildings.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.occupational_info: housewife

lenders.name: Erin & Ryan
lenders.loan_because: We want to thank our wedding guests with something that will help make the world a little better.

lenders.name: Jim,Connie & Angel
lenders.loan_because: By helping others we will be furthering world peace and prosperity.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I like small success stories.

lenders.name: chidi
lenders.loan_because: I need $500 dollars to expand my bussiness for my Book store
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student literature envagelist who is a representative of home health educational services, working with an international firm that supplies some printed pages of books for sales e.g Health Books like Encyclopedia of medicinal plants and Health & Education for the family, Bibles, Family life syle books and so on. I want to established a book store where this books will be available for sales.

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.occupational_info: Current student at Georgetown University

lenders.name: Lien
lenders.loan_because: I love capitalism.

lenders.name: Malcolm & Ann
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves support to realise their potential.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with computers and the internet.

lenders.name: Tactics3d
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed so we can be a blessing.

lenders.name: Jodie
lenders.loan_because: I am doing this for my grandaughter so she will  understand the importance of giving and sharing of what she has so much of.  She is a loving 9 year old who enjoys gymnastics and being with family and friends.

lenders.name: rommel
lenders.loan_because: simply want to help .

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward. If everyone gave something, time money, goods or just a word of hope, the world will be a better place.

lenders.name: lori
lenders.loan_because: there are so many people that need a helping hand.  I want to be a part of the solution, rather than just commenting on all the problems in our world.

lenders.name: M & D
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: We teach/advise college students.

lenders.name: arthur
lenders.loan_because: I want to create lots of lots of jobs for our people in south africa. I assisting consumers who are over in-debted, please asisst me.
lenders.occupational_info: over africa

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women gain a foothold in their communities through business.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: In my life, there were times when I needed help and it wasn't there and there were times when I needed help and it was there.  Having someone offer a helping hand is much better than trying to face the world alone, ill-prepared and unequipped.  I hope by this small gesture, my help can ripple through many lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to ensure that foster children in New York State receive necessary medical services to which they are entitled.

lenders.name: Laurent
lenders.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear

lenders.name: Mireille
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves to be financially free and I would like to help others achieve that.
lenders.occupational_info: At the moment I am an English tutor. I tutor according to the Oxford Learning Center English Second Language program. I enjoy working with the kids. In my spare time I am an infopreneur. I have my own website on the Internet, trying to help others feel great about themselves... http://www.feel-great-about-yourself.com

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I now have time to learn to play the piano...badly so far, but with slow improvement.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupational_info: I try to keep the big guys from picking on the little guys.

lenders.name: thomas & myfanwy
lenders.loan_because: born on an easy side of Planet
lenders.occupational_info: trying to help

lenders.name: Jo & Lee
lenders.loan_because:
I believe this program has a better
"bang for a buck" than other programs we have used.

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: Others have helped me, and now it's my turn.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Children and Family Services by providing clerical assistance to social workers who assist children who have been abused and/or neglected.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: each of us doing a little can help others achieve a lot.

lenders.name: Richard and Susan
lenders.loan_because: We love the people of the countries where our borrowers live, and very much want to help them succeed
lenders.occupational_info: We no longer work, but we have a full life - playing music, painting, traveling.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to help someone across the planet take care of themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer.  I represent people in claims against institutions.

lenders.name: John B. Perre
lenders.loan_because: Agape
lenders.occupational_info: Family Harmony & Philanthropy

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because:
It is a pleasure to help others.
We are all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people operate thier business better.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: it gives the recipient a greater sense of pride and accomplishment than simply making a gift.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major airline, and have traveled throughout third world countries and seen the huge impact  a small sum of money can have.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: We are teaching people how to fish!
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: irakly kaveladze
lenders.loan_because: I like the concept of microcredit.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to structure international business projects

lenders.name: Peter & Jake
lenders.loan_because: We would like to share our resources so others can realize new opportunities for their families. We enjoy travel, and learning about all the amazing cultures in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Peter helps rural communities in the Northwest United States create jobs through clean energy, such as wind and solar power, geothermal energy, and biofuels and biopower. Jake is a budding graphic designer and baseball fan.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and so I bless. It is as simple as that.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell homes

lenders.name: John & Elaine
lenders.loan_because: It's an effective, free-market method of eliminating poverty.

lenders.name: George & Mecca
lenders.loan_because: Fair and reasonable loans empower people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We love to travel. We have seen first-hand how ownership can change not only an individual's life, and that of his family;  but how it impacts the entire community and ultimately the culture.

lenders.name: Bhavesh
lenders.loan_because: it gives me a chance to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a financial company- basically in implementation of ERP systems and business intelligence products

lenders.name: Bob and Gayle
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a significant difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: Fun and imaginative

lenders.name: Kaye
lenders.occupation: retired financial analyst who does volunteer work
lenders.loan_because: My faith requires me to love my neighbor (brother/sister) as myself and this is a way to show love.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer with a group that grants wishes to seriously ill children, I work at a shelter for battered women, and I talk with people in crisis on a suicide phone line.

lenders.name: Cambridge CF Church
lenders.loan_because: God first gave to us.
lenders.occupational_info: We're a multiethnic church in Cambridge, MA, USA

lenders.name: Mehul & Ravisha
lenders.loan_because: Kiva gives us an avenue to reach people who have great need. We get the great satisfaction from lending the money through Kiva. We are happy and proud to be part of this amazing network. KIVA, keep up the good work!

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: There are many people out there that just need a little help to be self sufficient.

lenders.name: Gregor
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in SE Asia and have seen poverty at first hand. I was lucky to be born into a white, middle class, European family and I would hope someone would loan to me if the situation was reversed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help ensure my company can solve problems for our customers by recommending certain computer hardware and software.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to succeed.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: Real people can truly help real people.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop electronic products, and train other engineers in their use.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: Money loaned, repaid, and loaned again will help many more than a gift through an agency.

lenders.name: Alfred
lenders.loan_because: Can directly impact the lives of others in a positive manner.

lenders.name: Jane & Dennis
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we have both worked with lots of wonderful farmers and agriculturalists in Latin American and throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Jane works in a museum located in a wonderful Art Deco train station.  Dennis is semi-retired but continues his work on palm trees and teaching as a substitute in the local public school system.

lenders.name: Frank and Corri
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do :-D
lenders.occupational_info: The Mom in our little family is staying home with our newest little one, the Dad works in a technical field, and our kiddos are having fun being kiddos.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: The opportunity to help people help themselves is very seductive and rewarding. Honest people are worth the risk!
lenders.occupational_info: Self employed in hospitality and entertainment.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower women in the workplace...  We cannot survive without help and support from others, even if those people are across the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I am in college for music performance, and I someday hope to teach at a college. I currently teach college-level music at the college which I attend, and I am also a church musician for a local church.

lenders.name: Adam R.
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I love to help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I lend money.

lenders.name: Shannara
lenders.loan_because: ... the difference between charity and Kiva-ing is like giving a man a fish and giving him a fishing rod. I love to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Why wouldn't we?  The computers we use right now are individually worth at least  twice as much as most people earn in a year. (50 percent of the world's population earns less than 2 dollars a day)  Seems like a good enough reason to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a husband, father and journalist.  I tell stories.

lenders.name: Kelsey - Charleston, SC
lenders.loan_because: I have two great friends who gave me a gift certificate to Kiva as a graduation present and thought it was such a neat way to help others, and I hope that it will be a gift that keeps on giving!
lenders.occupational_info: I am in grad school for Speech Pathology

lenders.name: peter
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work providing mental, physical and spiritual health counseling for indigent populations in Summit County Colorado.

lenders.name: Kim & Brad
lenders.loan_because: because it is a great idea!
lenders.occupational_info: we are studio potters & own a contemporary craft gallery which features primarily North American craft artists as well as work from select fair trade organizations. (our website is still in the early stages...please check back again!)

lenders.name: Dominic
lenders.loan_because: Each invester individually can make a difference.  I have been blessed!

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I like to see others succeed and improve the quality of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Through my website Natural Living for Women I explore ways to live more naturally from our skin care  to our home.  I focus on knowing how to make safer more natural choices for ourselves and families but also caring about who and what is affected when our products are made.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: of the difference that a loan can make in someone's life. Because what seems like next to nothing can mean the world to someone else.

lenders.name: carol
lenders.loan_because: it is a way to make a difference.

lenders.name: Miller Family
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to bypass bureaucracy and help in a direct way people around the world that have been affected by the lop-sided wealth distribution in our world.

lenders.name: Sugato
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Jody and Jenna
lenders.occupation: Jody is a journalist and Jenna is a student
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we see the direct results of our loans, and we like the idea of helping people who are working so hard to help themselves.

lenders.name: yvonne and luke
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to offer them  the opportunity to create a better life for themselves, their families and their society.
lenders.occupational_info: I love volunteering (especially with my dog, Luke).....I have traveled to many countries and love the cultural diversity.  We can accomplish so much working from the inside out, and allowing people to make their own decisions and create their own destiny. ..

lenders.name: courtney
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because:
Microfinance really works and because I want to make the most difference I can.  

Because being able to take out a loan, and especially being able to take out a loan without a really high interest rate, can make such a difference.  It can make it so much easier to invest in the future and to build stronger, healthier, more secure, more sustainable families, communities, and economies.

We have a lot of investing for the future to do.  Access to capital is an important piece of the puzzle.
lenders.occupational_info: I just graduated from university.  I studied environmental studies.  I want to work with people finding community solutions to problems.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: It's too far to visit and I can't think of anything that makes a bigger difference in the world than helping its passengers.
lenders.occupational_info: I hope to use law to improve prople's lives, help families be together, protect the weak, and rein in the strong.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of microloans and web sites like Kiva.org that, used together, allow people living in more prosperous countries to connect with true small-business entrepreneurs we would otherwise not be able to help in such a direct manner.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a social worker studying to be a researcher and teacher so that I can become a better advocate for my fellow human beings.

lenders.name: Nackesha
lenders.loan_because: "To whom much is given, much is required."

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to be a citizen of a prosperous and free country.  I am privileged to be able to share that prosperity with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a psychologist who works with people who have been abused to help them heal from their painful memories.

lenders.name: Barney
lenders.loan_because: I am able and others can benefit.
lenders.occupational_info: Serving in the way of Jesus.

lenders.name: Milene
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: VICKIE
lenders.loan_because: I raised 2 sons of whom I am very proud . The thought that I could reach out to help in some small way brings me happiness.With world food prices I also add extra items to my cart to take to local food banks.One person can make a diffrence.Help even a little bit helps

lenders.name: matthew
lenders.loan_because: just thought I might help out,
lenders.occupational_info: just working around the house, and trying to keep it up...

lenders.name: E&T
lenders.loan_because: It is exciting to be able to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: it's the very least I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student pursuing a masters degree in library and information management with a strong interest in anti-poverty work, human rights and social justice.  Eventually I plan on attending law school and build a career doing anti-poverty legal work on both a local and transnational level.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I loan to give entrepreneur’s that need support a break.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help make the world markets more transparent and fair to investors.

lenders.loan_because: We believe that everyone is connected and it is our responsibility to help those who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: Steve is a Juvenile Court Judge. He hears cases regarding childrens & familiy issues.  Shellie is a Parent Mentor for a local school district. She works with families who have children with disabilities.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help other women who need money to achieve their dreams.
Quisiera ayudar a otras mujeres quien necesitan dinero a realizar sus sueños.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a writer, poet, and translator.  I work as a computer programmer and web developer, and sometimes as a teacher. 
Soy escritora, poeta, traductora. Estoy trabajando con computadores y a veces, soy profesora.

lenders.name: lisa
lenders.loan_because: it's good for the world.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it empowers people and allows them take control of their futures.  This leads to greater freedom, independence, and a higher quality of life.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it possible.

lenders.name: Anudeva and Hanna
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Anudeva works with plants and animals and Hanna is a painter.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: Because my faith compels me to embody thankfulness  for the amazing resources in my care simply for being born in the US.  I do not take that responsibility lightly and loaning money  in this way one way to show that thanks.

lenders.loan_because: I want my money to go directly to Women.
lenders.occupational_info: I run our house and raise our children, while my wife works for money.

lenders.loan_because: Hard working people can use an assist

lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteer.

lenders.name: Noob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others succeed in fulfilling their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: As a ferret, I enjoy sleeping half my day away. I then eat and drink some water,  play for a few hours, then it is time for sleep again. My work is very easy as a ferret.

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: I see that microfinance truly works and I want to love people through what I have and what I give.

lenders.name: Inze
lenders.loan_because: I like to travel around the world, and on my trips I encounter a lot of poverty. I like to try and help these people by enabeling them a small loan.

lenders.name: Espen
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is the most effective way of helping people.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for a financial newspaper about business and economy in one of the richest countries in the world.

lenders.name: Will & Nick
lenders.loan_because: our Didi was a dentist.

lenders.name: Fred DeFalco
lenders.loan_because: The ability to be a resource to people around the world is very exciting. Kiva makes the Golden Rule easy to fulfill around the world.

lenders.name: jeff
lenders.loan_because: I believe it can make a difference to others.

lenders.name: Emmanuel
lenders.loan_because: I want to positively affect lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am into providing personal and corporate websites at a highly affordable rates.

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: We are resposnisble for one another, regardless of international borders.
lenders.occupational_info: Make paper

lenders.name: shelagh
lenders.loan_because: Here in Canada we have so much, even when we think we don't. Every time you help someone else you help yourself. We are all in this together.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that our calling is to help others.  This opportunity allows me to help individuals and families around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I are pastors of small churches (Lutheran and United Methodist, respectively).  Much of our time is spent helping people in need and caring for the hurting.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I've been an entrepreneur all my life and want to support people around the world who are working to better their lives.  I've been fortunate to be able to live a secure and comfortable life in the US. I would wish that for all my fellow humans.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I'm retired from real estate sales and development; I still manage a small building.  In the past I've had retail stores, done importing, product design, real estate brokerage and development -mostly adaptive re-use of old buildings.

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because: I think entrepreneurs can change the world to a better world. And all payed back loans will be reinvested.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a coach exclusive for entrepreneurs of small and medium enterprises. I'm also author of books and founder of an education-portal for entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Damon
lenders.loan_because: everyone's dreams are realized when we invest in each other and not opaque institutions
lenders.occupational_info:
I decode DNA at my day job and do educaiton at high schools on biotech.
I take care of an apartment complex in Oakland California for my evening/community building job
I do freelance photography on the side

lenders.name: THESTUDENTSCHOOL
lenders.loan_because: Our committee fund raises at our high school and contributes to several progressive organizations, one being kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: high school students acting on injustice.  Microloans as an alternative to the mainstream development model.

lenders.name: Antoni & Mary
lenders.loan_because: We would like to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Antoni maintains computer systems and Mary teaches music to children

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: We are trying to be a responsible business and feel that Kiva.org provides us with an excellent opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: We build and sell modular homes throughout Vermont and Northern New England, providing affordable housing.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I can.  It's the right thing to do.  It feels good to help someone directly.  Each loan is a reminder that in this small world one person can make a difference.  I like helping people with a work ethic similar to mine.
lenders.occupational_info: I help teachers help children become bilingual.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I dance, I garden, I learn.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: These loans are in memory of a friend who understood the need for compassionate strangers in the world. He was gifted, often conflicted, and he tried as hard as he could, which is as much as you can ask of any man. I know he would, without hesitation, help anyone else who was trying hard as well. Starting his own business was very precious to him, and he was proud to help others in this way.

lenders.name: Lester
lenders.loan_because: Trade is bigger than aid.

lenders.name: Karthik
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the opportunities I've been handed to those who have the will and determination to succeed with a break.

lenders.name: Lawrence
lenders.loan_because: It fits my view of how to best match fiscal responsibility and social justice.

lenders.name: Bennett
lenders.loan_because: Rising tides lift all boats.
lenders.occupational_info:
I investigate the workings of life at the single-molecule level.  

Consider curing disease or doing bioengineering attempting to fix a refrigerator for which the schematics are unclear and only cover a third of the components.  I'm one of the many people fleshing out that manual.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky in business and life and would like to help others improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses manage their information.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone who wants to better themselves, their family, or their community deserves the opportunity to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that allows people anywhere in the world to trade directly with anyone else using the Internet.  I protect this virtual community founded on commerce

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: I have been very lucky in my life, and want to give something back!  I enjoy contributing to a program that empowers individuals and also makes the world feel like a more intimate, optimistic place.  This is such a wonderful idea actualized!
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for Leah's Pantry Inc., a non-profit organization that provides free nutrition workshops for people living in transitional, affordable and emergency housing shelters.     I help organize our workshops throughout California and facilitate workshops in San Francisco.

www.leahspantry.org

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: It's the next best thing to being able to travel and help others around the world

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I am fortunate to work for a large computer company, so I get the opportunity to work with a lot of modern technology.

lenders.name: La Luna Center
lenders.loan_because: I'm all for women owned small businesses!
lenders.occupational_info: Helping women overcome eating disorders.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I may not be able to have a big impact on the world, but I can have a big impact in the lives of the people I loan to.  Serving justice, serving others.

lenders.name: Elen

lenders.occupational_info: I develop new natural foods

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate in my small wall covering installation business, and want to help out someone else, especially in parts of the world were it's not so easy to get help. I'm very happy to be able to do something in this way!
lenders.occupational_info: I install (hang) wall coverings for clients in home, yachts and businesses

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and research mathematics at Michigan State University.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and so many are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professor at a small college

-we can

-we love it

lenders.name: Nicole

lenders.name: Abagail

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: it's only fair.

lenders.occupational_info: Fun and involved.

There is a great quote from my favorite book, "Buddha Is As Buddha Does," by Lama Surya Das and it says, "May I perfect the sublime virtue of generosity, which liberates and releases craving, grasping, and attachment, and brings joyous contentment."
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a nurse. I hope to work as a nurse that travels on the flight-for-life helicopters in situations where patients are so seriously injured that they need to travel to the hospital by air transportation.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lenders.occupational_info: AmeriCorps VISTA

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Anytime my local community can add value to our global community it just seems like the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is what gives life meaning.
lenders.occupational_info: We make the machine that makes the world go around.

lenders.name: Neal
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of entrepreneurship, and people helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: The concept of financial planning would seem ridiculous to poor people in the world.  How do you manage your extra money?

lenders.name: D
lenders.loan_because: I believe in reaching out to others to offer a hand up...

lenders.name: Julie & Dale
lenders.loan_because:
Because others have given so much to us... we believe by "paying it forward" we can show gratitude for our own blessings.

OK, so in lieu of more toys that our friends' children don't need, we loan money through Kiva in the child’s name.  Then, when the loan is repayed, they get the money.  A year later, they get to decide whether to take the repaid loan as cash, or recycle it by loaning it again to someone new.

I like this.
lenders.occupational_info: Wife does office work helping to enroll students in a private school outside Los Angeles, California; husband manages financial institutions (credit unions).

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired certified public accountant.

lenders.name: Len Estill
lenders.loan_because: I am incredibly lucky to live in freedom and want to help those who haven't had the opportunities I've been given.  I also wish to assist someone who makes their living sewing, as I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work out of my home making items for sale at local shops.  My specialty is using vintage and antique goods (such as fabrics, laces, quilts and all kinds of supplies I find at thrift stores, garage sales and generous friends) to make items for resale.  I started my business when my son was small so I could be home with him.  He is now grown and I'm semi-retired.  Sewing has given me a creative outlet that has brought me peace and joy, and provided me a good living in the company of many wonderful people.

lenders.name: Scott, Shannon, Saffron
lenders.loan_because: Small businesses are the foundation of the economy, and no small business can flourish without access to capital.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a business designing and manufacturing furniture.

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: My money can make a difference for many people. Working for one's own happiness alone, makes no sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people here in the U.S. save money on their home mortgages by getting them fair interest rates.

lenders.name: muawia
lenders.loan_because: iwant povertiy pepole around the world feel more comfartable,in gaining  thier expenss of living.
lenders.occupational_info: acturlly ,igive acure medicine to illness pepole, wheneverand where ever need helps.in camps,hospitals,and in streets ...ext

lenders.name: celeste
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Work in western Alaskan villages to enhance the economy and preserve fisheries as a way of life.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: Something that makes so little difference to me can make so much difference to these people and their families.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.occupation: Singer, Engineer, Soldier, and now Lender
lenders.loan_because:
'Do not store up for yourselves treasure on earth, where moth and rust destroy, and where thieves break in and steal.  But store up for yourselves treasures in heaven.."

Matthew 6:19-20

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: people need money and I have money.
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to hear how God wants me to love people and help others do the same.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: ...it matters.

lenders.name: SHL
lenders.loan_because: I believe a little can go a long way.  And if a lot of people do a lot of "little" then it will become a lot of a lot!
lenders.occupational_info: I am just a regular guy.  I wake up, go to work, eat, sleep, and do it all over again the next day.  As a hobby, I am a soccer referee.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: All that I have is a blessing from, and belongs to, God.  I want share that blessing with others who deserve and need love from others.
lenders.occupational_info: Ground Control Electronics Tech

lenders.name: vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed in life. As a single mother of three I want to share what I can, and I hope to instill in my children the desire to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: US Navy retired, and work for DOD now.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together, and I can do something to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college courses in English composition, literature, and adult education.

lenders.name: Loren
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to strive to better oneself.  If I can make a small contribution to someone's dream, then I am enriched!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a furniture store in my hometown.  Our large showroom displays living room,bedroom and dining room furnishings.  I assist our customers in choosing their new furniture.  I am paid by the hour and I receive a percentage of my sales as a commission.

lenders.name: Harry and Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: It helps people improve their situation.

lenders.name: Alissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than myself to have a chance at improving their circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: A giant headache of paperwork and numbers.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: It makes a powerful impact!
lenders.occupational_info: Teach people how to become successful in their personal and professional lives
